channel.title: Server Tutorial or something
channel.description:
I need to know how to put this on your server:
[img]http://img109.imageshack.us/img109/7600/playerscj7.jpg[/img]
Thanks.
[i]Sorry for using escapeescape picture(who ever made that server)[/i]

item.title: Server Tutorial or something
item.dc:creator: @3_hit_pk_y0u 3 hit pk y0u
item.description:
@3_hit_pk_y0u wrote:

I’m using Testscape and should it look like this:

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
public void writePlayers() {
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
sendFrame126("@whi@ AussieScape", 6570);
sendFrame126("@cya@ Hope you Enjoy! “);
sendFrame126(”@gre@ Players Online" + players, 6572);
setInterfaceWalkable(6673);

Read full topic

item.title: Server Tutorial or something
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Halo Mod Halo
item.description:
@Mod_Halo wrote:

[quote=“3 hit pk y0u, post:1, topic:43518”]I need to know how to put this on your server:

Thanks.

Sorry for using escapeescape picture(who ever made that server)[/quote]

Ok declare this into your Client.Java file under "public class client extends Player implements Runnable {".
Now press enter and put this on that line when you hit enter:

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@whi@ ServerNameHere", 6570); sendFrame126("@cya@ Have Fun "); sendFrame126("@gre@Players Online" + players, 6572); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); }

There, now you have what you wanted :), take some time to read my sig too

Read full topic
